attributes.action: Re-open Wattisham Airfield as a Civil Airfield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see Wattisham Airfield in Suffolk re-opened for Civil Flying.

RAF Wattisham was a Royal Air Force station south of Stowmarket in Suffolk, England. 

If Civil Flying were brought back to Wattisham it would benefit greatly the local area and economy and also would be a boost to tourism in this area of Suffolk. The Airfield is a historic US base and BAttle Of Britain Airfield and it would be really good to see Civil Flying come back to Wattisham
